scene: Muscle Beach outdoor gym - Venice Beach - 1987 DAWN

camera_position.starts: Low angle hero shot - sun rising behind Rex
camera_position.movement: Slow circular dolly around Rex working out
camera_position.ends: Medium shot as Rex notices something off-screen

environment.primary_location: Muscle Beach outdoor gym at sunrise

REX_THUNDER_ARMSTRONG.wardrobe: Army PT shorts, dog tags, no shirt, red bandana

sequence_breakdown.visual: REX doing one-arm pull-ups, dog tags swinging, muscles glistening in sunrise
REX switches to one-arm push-ups, sweat dripping
REX stands, grabs water bottle, talks to himself
sequence_breakdown.dialogue: [REX SPEAKING]: Three years retired. Three years of peace.

sequence_breakdown.visual: REX hears engines, head snaps toward sound, muscles tense

visual_requirements: Rex is ONLY character on screen
